title: Mordekaiser is not OP
body:
You people sound like clowns.
https://lolalytics.com/ranked/worldwide/platinum/plus/champion/Mordekaiser/graphs/
Look at his win rate after the Hotfix, sits at 50% in most elos, and is dropping to sub 50% in higher elos where people actually learn to play against him.
Is he annoying to play against? Maybe, but that doesn't make him OP. 

This champ has a low skillcap so it's not like people are still learning to play him, and his WR will only continue to drop when people learn to gauge his damage properly while vsing him.

Now compare him with a champ who is actually OP {{champion:92}}, more mobile, more burst, less counterplay, and 53% wr in high elo. 

If Morde was nerfed again, you might as well delete the champ, because he already hard loses into meta duelist toplaners like {{champion:39}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:92}} .

Morde has plenty of counterplay options, people just need to use their brain.
